##### I am a PhD candidate in Economics at New York University. 

In my research, I use methods from Empirical Industrial Organization to study access to Education, wait times in Healthcare, and diversity of content in the News market.

In my [Job Market Paper](content/bodere_jmp.pdf), I study the design of early childhood education policies in the United States.

I will join the Yale School of Management as an Assistant Professor in Economics in 2024 after a Postdoc at Princeton University. Click [here](content/bodere_academic_cv_nyu.pdf) for my CV.
